alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Platte; Stanton (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 3:22AM CDT until April 22 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Eastern Platte County in northeastern Nebraska... Southern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 322 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Columbus, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Colfax, eastern Platte and southern Stanton Counties, including the following locations... Lake North Babcock Campground, 9 Miles North Of Schuyler, Central Community College, College View Trailer Park, Camp Pawnee, Lake Ocaonee, Circle H Trailer Park, Shell Creek Elementary School, Maple Creek Recreation Area and Camp Luther. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
